content.text: Match ends, Shrewsbury Town 0, Manchester United 3.
Second Half ends, Shrewsbury Town 0, Manchester United 3.
Foul by Ian Black (Shrewsbury Town).
Andreas Pereira (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Larnell Cole (Shrewsbury Town) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Jack Grimmer.
Attempt saved. Memphis Depay (Manchester United) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Andreas Pereira.
Attempt missed. Abu Ogogo (Shrewsbury Town) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Jack Grimmer with a cross.
Abu Ogogo (Shrewsbury Town) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Memphis Depay (Manchester United).
Attempt missed. Joe Riley (Manchester United) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
Attempt missed. Memphis Depay (Manchester United) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Andreas Pereira.
Substitution, Shrewsbury Town. Jordan Clark replaces Jean-Louis Akpa-Akpro.
Andreas Pereira (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jermaine Grandison (Shrewsbury Town).
Foul by Abu Ogogo (Shrewsbury Town).
Sergio Romero (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Zak Whitbread (Shrewsbury Town) header from very close range misses to the right. Assisted by Junior Brown with a cross following a set piece situation.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Will Keane went off injured after Manchester United had used all subs.
Delay in match Will Keane (Manchester United) because of an injury.
Shaun Whalley (Shrewsbury Town) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Memphis Depay (Manchester United).
Will Keane (Manchester United) hits the left post with a left footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Memphis Depay.
Attempt missed. Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Memphis Depay with a through ball.
Substitution, Manchester United. Will Keane replaces Anthony Martial.
Substitution, Manchester United. Andreas Pereira replaces Juan Mata.
Attempt missed. Memphis Depay (Manchester United) right footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.
Jack Grimmer (Shrewsbury Town) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jack Grimmer (Shrewsbury Town).
Goal!  Shrewsbury Town 0, Manchester United 3. Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Ander Herrera.
Foul by Juan Mata (Manchester United).
Ian Black (Shrewsbury Town) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Offside, Shrewsbury Town. Ian Black tries a through ball, but Shaun Whalley is caught offside.
Foul by Joe Riley (Manchester United).
Jean-Louis Akpa-Akpro (Shrewsbury Town) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Guillermo Varela (Manchester United).
Junior Brown (Shrewsbury Town) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Anthony Martial (Manchester United) header from very close range misses to the left. Assisted by Juan Mata following a corner.
Corner,  Manchester United. Conceded by Jermaine Grandison.
Attempt blocked. Memphis Depay (Manchester United) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Juan Mata.
Corner,  Manchester United. Conceded by Junior Brown.
Attempt blocked. Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Juan Mata with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Ander Herrera (Manchester United) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Juan Mata.
Memphis Depay (Manchester United) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Jack Grimmer (Shrewsbury Town).
Substitution, Shrewsbury Town. Larnell Cole replaces Nathaniel Knight-Percival.
Second Half begins Shrewsbury Town 0, Manchester United 2.
Substitution, Manchester United. Joe Riley replaces Cameron Borthwick-Jackson.
First Half ends, Shrewsbury Town 0, Manchester United 2.
Goal!  Shrewsbury Town 0, Manchester United 2. Juan Mata (Manchester United) from a free kick with a left footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Zak Whitbread (Shrewsbury Town) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
